body_html:
I am sorry. We have no way to build for all platforms out there. If the binaries we publish don't work on your platform, you have to build from source. Our build process has dependencies too, if you have no way to install those dependencies, you're out of luck.

Often, the simplest solution is docker, or using an installation of your target system inside a docker container running on a modern machine to build.
body_text:
I am sorry. We have no way to build for all platforms out there. If the binaries we publish don't work on your platform, you have to build from source. Our build process has dependencies too, if you have no way to install those dependencies, you're out of luck.
Often, the simplest solution is docker, or using an installation of your target system inside a docker container running on a modern machine to build.
body:
I am sorry. We have no way to build for all platforms out there. If the binaries we publish don't work on your platform, you have to build from source. Our build process has dependencies too, if you have no way to install those dependencies, you're out of luck. 

Often, the simplest solution is docker, or using an installation of your target system inside a docker container running on a modern machine to build.
